languages.text: {n}Повисает неловкая тишина, и навигатор хмурится, поджимая бледные губы.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, будьте любезны объясниться — отчего вы сейчас докучаете мне своими расспросами? Интересуетесь настроением, нуждами, обсуждаете книги? Ведете себя так, будто можете испытывать хоть каплю симпатии к такой, как я!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Повисает неловкая тишина, и Навигатор хмурится, поджимая бледные губы.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, будьте любезны объясниться — отчего вы сейчас докучаете мне своими расспросами? Интересуетесь настроением, нуждами, обсуждаете книги? Ведете себя так, будто можете испытывать хоть каплю симпатии к такой, как я!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}After an awkward silence, Cassia frowns and purses her lips.{/n} "Lord Captain, would you kindly explain to me why you are pestering me with these questions? Enquiring about my mood and my needs, showing an interest in the books I am enjoying? You are behaving as if you possessed a shred of fellow feeling for one such as I!"
languages.original_text: {n}Повисает неловкая тишина, и навигатор хмурится, поджимая бледные губы.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, будьте любезны объясниться — отчего вы сейчас докучаете мне своими расспросами? Интересуетесь настроением, нуждами, обсуждаете книги? Ведете себя так, будто можете испытывать хоть каплю симпатии к такой, как я!"

Enquiring about my mood and my needs, showing an interest in the books I am enjoying? You are behaving as if you had a shred of sympathy for someone like I!"

traits.locale_text: {n}After an awkward silence, Cassia frowns and purses her lips.{/n} "Lord Captain, would you kindly explain to me why you are pestering me with these questions? Enquiring about my mood and my needs, showing an interest in the books I am enjoying? You are behaving as if you possessed a shred of fellow feeling for one such as I!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nach einem betretenen Schweigen runzelt Cassia die Stirn und schürzt die Lippen.{/n} "Lord Captain, würdet Ihr mir gnädigerweise erklären, warum Ihr mich mit diesen Fragen löchert? Nach meiner Laune und meinen Bedürfnissen fragen, ein Interesse an den Büchern zeigen, die ich gerne lese? Ihr verhaltet Euch, als würdet Ihr einen Funken von Empfindung gegenüber jemandem wie mir besitzen!"
languages.original_text: {n}After an awkward silence, Cassia frowns and purses her lips.{/n} "Lord Captain, would you kindly explain to me why you are pestering me with these questions? Enquiring about my mood and my needs, showing an interest in the books I am enjoying? You are behaving as if you possessed a shred of fellow feeling for one such as I!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einem betretenen Schweigen runzelt Cassia die Stirn und schürzt die Lippen.{/n} "Lord Captain, würdet Ihr mir gnädigerweise erklären, warum Ihr mich mit diesen Fragen löchert? Nach meiner Laune und meinen Bedürfnissen fragen, ein Interesse an den Büchern zeigen, die ich gerne lese? Ihr verhaltet Euch, als würdet Ihr einen Funken von Empfindung gegenüber jemandem wie mir besitzen!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Après un silence gênant, Cassia fronce les sourcils et retrousse ses lèvres.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, auriez-vous la gentillesse de m'expliquer pourquoi vous me harcelez de questions ? Pourquoi vous enquérir de mon humeur et mes besoins, ou vous intéresser aux lectures que j'apprécie ? Vous agissez comme si vous éprouviez de la sympathie pour quelqu'un comme moi ! »
languages.original_text: {n}After an awkward silence, Cassia frowns and purses her lips.{/n} "Lord Captain, would you kindly explain to me why you are pestering me with these questions? Enquiring about my mood and my needs, showing an interest in the books I am enjoying? You are behaving as if you possessed a shred of fellow feeling for one such as I!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Après un silence gênant, Cassia fronce les sourcils et retrousse ses lèvres.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, auriez-vous la gentillesse de m'expliquer pourquoi vous me harcelez de questions ? Pourquoi vous enquérir de mon humeur et mes besoins, ou vous intéresser aux lectures que j'apprécie ? Vous agissez comme si vous éprouviez de la sympathie pour quelqu'un comme moi ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}一阵尴尬的沉默过后，卡西娅皱起眉头，抿了抿嘴唇。{/n}“舰长大人，希望你能为我解惑：你为什么非要问我这些问题？为什么要关心我的情绪和需求，关心我的阅读兴趣？莫非你对我这样的人也抱有一丝同胞的情谊吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}After an awkward silence, Cassia frowns and purses her lips.{/n} "Lord Captain, would you kindly explain to me why you are pestering me with these questions? Enquiring about my mood and my needs, showing an interest in the books I am enjoying? You are behaving as if you possessed a shred of fellow feeling for one such as I!"

traits.locale_text: {n}一阵尴尬的沉默过后，卡西娅皱起眉头，抿了抿嘴唇。{/n}“舰长大人，希望你能为我解惑：你为什么非要问我这些问题？为什么要关心我的情绪和需求，关心我的阅读兴趣？莫非你对我这样的人也抱有一丝同胞的情谊吗？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}気まずい沈黙の後、カシアは眉をひそめ、唇をすぼめる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、なぜこのような質問であたくしを悩ませるのか、説明していただけますか？あたくしの気分や必要なものを尋ねたり、あたくしが楽しんでいる本に興味を示したり。{name}様はまるで、あたくしのような者に仲間意識を有しているかのようです！」
languages.original_text: {n}After an awkward silence, Cassia frowns and purses her lips.{/n} "Lord Captain, would you kindly explain to me why you are pestering me with these questions? Enquiring about my mood and my needs, showing an interest in the books I am enjoying? You are behaving as if you possessed a shred of fellow feeling for one such as I!"

traits.locale_text: {n}気まずい沈黙の後、カシアは眉をひそめ、唇をすぼめる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、なぜこのような質問であたくしを悩ませるのか、説明していただけますか？あたくしの気分や必要なものを尋ねたり、あたくしが楽しんでいる本に興味を示したり。{name}様はまるで、あたくしのような者に仲間意識を有しているかのようです！」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Después de un silencio incómodo, Cassia frunce el ceño y aprieta los labios.{/n} «Lord Capitán, ¿podría explicarme por qué me acosa con estas preguntas, interesándose por mi estado de ánimo y mis necesidades, además de por el libro que estoy leyendo? ¡Se comporta como si tuviera una pizca de sentimientos hacia alguien como yo!».
languages.original_text: {n}After an awkward silence, Cassia frowns and purses her lips.{/n} "Lord Captain, would you kindly explain to me why you are pestering me with these questions? Enquiring about my mood and my needs, showing an interest in the books I am enjoying? You are behaving as if you possessed a shred of fellow feeling for one such as I!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Después de un silencio incómodo, Cassia frunce el ceño y aprieta los labios.{/n} «Lord Capitán, ¿podría explicarme por qué me acosa con estas preguntas, interesándose por mi estado de ánimo y mis necesidades, además de por el libro que estoy leyendo? ¡Se comporta como si tuviera una pizca de sentimientos hacia alguien como yo!».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}After an awkward silence, Cassia frowns and purses her lips.{/n} "Lord Captain, would you kindly explain to me why you are pestering me with these questions? Enquiring about my mood and my needs, showing an interest in the books I am enjoying? You are behaving as if you possessed a shred of fellow feeling for one such as I!"

languages.text: {n}Huzursuz bir sessizliğin ardından Cassia, kaşlarını çatıp dudaklarını büzüyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, rica etsem beni hangi akla hizmet bu tarz sorulara maruz bıraktığını açıklar mısın? Hâlimi hatırımı sual etmek, okuduğum kitaplarla ilgilenmek de neyin nesi? Gören de benim gibi birine karşı sempati kırıntıları barındırıyorsun sanır!"
languages.original_text: {n}After an awkward silence, Cassia frowns and purses her lips.{/n} "Lord Captain, would you kindly explain to me why you are pestering me with these questions? Enquiring about my mood and my needs, showing an interest in the books I am enjoying? You are behaving as if you possessed a shred of fellow feeling for one such as I!"
